title: Beautiful 1 Bedroom Apartment In The Heart Of San Jose! One Month Free
posting_body: ['4 WEEKS FREE!*', '*Restrictions apply.', 'Contact our leasing office for details.', 'Welcome to The James', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 701 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments are set in a coveted downtown San Jose location.', 'The James serves as a beacon continually welcoming you home from wherever your day takes you.', 'Adjacent to two VTA Stations, you have access to all of Silicon Valley.', 'Prefer to stay in the neighborhood?', 'San Pedro Square is two blocks away while Japantown is a short VTA ride.', 'Inside, The James is as spectacular as it is well-located.', 'Deco-inspired design, oh-so-sumptuous finishes and at-home amenities fuse together to create truly landmark living.', "The James is where you'll want to build your future.", 'A future that still holds trails left to be blazed.', 'Features:', 'Oversized walk-in closets, Double-paned glass windows, Programmable heating and air, Covered private patio, terrace, or balcony, Wood-look plank flooring throughout living spaces, In-home, full-size washer & dryer, Spa-like bathrooms with soaking tubs, quartz vanity tops and framed mirrors, Dramatic 9-foot ceilings*, Double bowl drop sink with high arc pull-out faucet, Stainless steel finish appliances, The TUX Home: Upper white shaker cabinet and baroque grain lowers, polished quartz countertops with eased edge and custom pebbled backsplash, The LUX Home: Espresso shaker style cabinets, polished quartz countertops, glazed charcoal subway tile backsplash, Lightning fast GIGA internet speed, USB charging outlets', 'Community Amenities:', 'Planned social activities, Just two blocks from San Pedro Square, Pet friendly (ask for details), Bike storage and repair, Conference center, Onsite self-service pet spa, Communal workspace with Wi-Fi, two printers and a copier, Sundeck with heated pool, cabanas and spa, Professional onsite management, Outdoor courtyard with grills and fire pit, Controlled access parking Complimentary Wi-Fi in common areas, Hub by Amazon lockers for 24/7 package access, Between St. James & Santa Clara VTA light rail stations, 24-hour fitness center including a boxing heavy bag, Smoke-free community, Social lounge with shuffleboard, billiards, kitchen, and TVs, Downtown San Jose location surrounded by the arts', 'Pet Policy', 'We are pet friendly!', 'Please visit our website for additional details.', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.', 'Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.', 'Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.', 'Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.', '4klZEQqv6yE']
